text: Vengeful Ascension is the seventh studio album by blackened death metal band Goatwhore, released on June 23, 2017 by Metal Blade Records. In addition to the standard release, a special "Spell Book" edition was also released, limited to 3000 copies. This edition includes a 40-page hardcover book containing lyrics and imagery relating to the album, the album itself on CD, and a bonus CD containing 13 additional tracks featuring several live recordings, cover songs, etc. ==Track listing== Bonus CD (included in the limited edition "Spell Book" release) ==Personnel== * L. Ben Falgoust II – lead vocals * Sammy Duet – guitars, backing vocals * James Harvey – bass * Zack Simmons – drums ==References== Category:2017 albums Category:Goatwhore albums Category:Metal Blade Records albums
title: Vengeful Ascension
